newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Learning Co downgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Learning Co downgraded.

text.p: -- Oppenheimer & Co analyst Leonard Brecken downgraded the educational software company to market performer from outperformer, according to a research report released Friday.

-- Brecken cited a recent PC Data reseach report that said the Learning Co's educational market sales rose only five percent in the Christmas quarter and actually declined in December. The company also lost market share to competitors.
-- "In our opinion uncertainty over the state of TLC's retail business will keep a lid on the stock's appreciation," Brecken wrote in the report.
-- Learning Co was down 3-3/8 at 12-5/8 in afternoon trading of 4.4 million shares, making the stock the third-most active on the New York Stock Exchange.
